app_description.message: ChatGPT Custom Shortcuts Pro adds keyboard shortcuts to scroll, copy, start new chats, toggle the sidebar, switch models, and more.

label_toggle_sidebar_folders.message: Toggle Sidebar Folders Down for Repairs

tt_send.message: Check to make Control + Enter send the message.

tt_stop.message: Check to make Control + Backspace stop response generation.

tt_scroll_up_one.message: Scrolls up one message at a time.

tt_scroll_down_one.message: Scrolls down one message at a time.

tt_scroll_top.message: Scrolls up to the first message.

tt_pgup_pgdown.message: Enable to make PageUp and PageDown always scroll the conversation.

tt_send_top_bar.message: Enable to place the model selector below the message box. Great for small screens.

tt_opacity_slider.message: Slide right to keep the bottom bar visible. Slide left to hide it until you hover.

tt_copy_plain.message: Activate the lowest visible, native copy button.

tt_strip_md.message: Enable to remove Markdown * and ### from text copied with Alt+C, while leaving code boxes unchanged. Requires clipboard access.

tt_select_copy.message: Simulates mouse-selecting text and pressing Ctrl+C. Press repeatedly to cycle through visible messages.

tt_select_copy_behavior.message: Select any message, only yours, or only ChatGPT’s.

tt_select_assistant.message: Only select messages sent by ChatGPT.

tt_select_user.message: Only select messages sent by you.

tt_disable_autocopy.message: Check to disable auto-copy (i.e. now it only selects the text).

tt_prev_thread.message: Click '<'. Use Control+Alt+shortcut to scroll between '<' without clicking.

tt_next_thread.message: Click '>'. Use Control+Alt+shortcut to scroll between '>' without clicking.

tt_edit_msg.message: Click edit on the lowest visible user message. Press again to go to the next one up.

tt_join_all.message: Join all ChatGPT responses in the conversation and copy to clipboard. Skips user input.

tt_join_separator.message: Customize separator between joined items. Use a space +\n for line breaks.

tt_join_code.message: Join all code blocks and copy to clipboard. Skips user input.

tt_code_separator.message: Customize separator between code blocks. Use a space + \n for line breaks.

tt_hide_arrows.message: Hide the up and down arrow buttons.

tt_showModelPicker_plain.message: Show the ChatGPT Plus model picker

tt_pick_model_plain.message: Switch ChatGPT models using Shortcut key with Alt or Control. Click any number to set or clear a custom shortcut.

tt_use_Alt_for_picker.message: Use Alt+Shortcut to switch models. Click any number to set or clear a custom shortcut.

tt_use_Control_for_picker.message: Use Control+Shortcut to switch models. Click any number to set or clear a custom shortcut.

tt_regenerate.message: Clicks the lowest visible regenerate response button.

tt_rememberSidebarScrollPositionCheckbox.message: Enable to remember the sidebar scroll position.

tt_slim_opacity_slider.message: Fade the slim sidebar. Hover mouse to reveal.

tt_temp_chat.message: Toggle Temporary Chat (available before you send the first message.)

tt_think_longer.message: Only available in the free version. Engage deeper reasoning for a more thorough answer.

tt_study.message: Toggle tool to explain step-by-step, link concepts, and reinforce understanding.

tt_add_photos_files.message: Attach images or files to a message.

tt_toggle_dictate.message: Press once to start dictation. Press again to submit dictation.

tt_cancel_dictation.message: Cancel dictation in progress without transcribing.

tt_share.message: Create a link to share the conversation.

tt_restore_shiftupdown.message: Blocks native "Next Message" and "Previous Message" shortcuts so you can select lines normally when typing.
